Class TicketReport

  • java.lang.Object
    • Report
      • TicketReport

  • public class TicketReport
extends Report
    TicketReport Class Each instance is a monthly report of the ticket sales and average rating for one film

        film, month, year

      addRating Add the rating to the total sum of ratings.
      java.lang.String getAverageRating()
      getAverageRating Sum of ratings divided by rating count If rating count is zero, return string "N/A"

      getRatingCounter Get total count of ratings
      int getTicketCounter()
      getTicketCounter Get total count of tickets sold
